thread.title: Walmart Brings Convenience, Affordable Grocery Options and New Jobs to Trenton
thread.title_full: Walmart Brings Convenience, Affordable Grocery Options and New Jobs to Trenton

title: Walmart Brings Convenience, Affordable Grocery Options and New Jobs to Trenton
text:
New Walmart Neighborhood Market located at 1209 E. Wade St. Approximately 30 jobs created by Trenton Walmart Neighborhood Market Store open 7 a.m. to 10 p.m., seven days a week Local Facebook page: www.facebook.com/walmart4265 
TRENTON, Fla., June 24, 2015 - A new Walmart Neighborhood Market is opening Wednesday, July 1, following a brief ribbon-cutting ceremony at 7:30 a.m. The new store is conveniently located at 1209 E. Wade St. and is open 7 a.m. to 10 p.m., seven days a week. The store will provide Trenton residents with low prices on a broad assortment of merchandise including fresh produce and meats, frozen foods, groceries, fuel and pharmacy. 
Customers can shop additional items including toys, electronics and home decor on Walmart.com through Walmart pickup, which will offer free shipping to the Trenton Walmart Neighborhood Market. 
"The new Walmart Neighborhood Market will provide the Trenton community with a convenient, friendly, fast option right in town," said store manager Andy Zeyen. "From meat and fresh produce to affordable fuel, our new format will have the variety and affordability to help residents save money and live better." 
Fresh, Affordable Groceries The new store offers fresh produce and a full line of groceries from leading brand names, including organic selections. By working with growers Walmart is able to provide farm-grown quality produce at added convenience and low prices. There is also a wide variety of meat and bakery selections, and local favorites such as Nettles sausage. 
The Right Size Store Offering More Convenience The new store is approximately 12,000 square feet and offers a wide assortment to meet the needs of Trenton residents. In addition to groceries, the store features health and beauty aids, pet products and cleaning supplies. Shopping is more convenient than ever as Trenton residents can shop an assortment of 7 million items on Walmart.com, many of which can be shipped for free to the new Walmart Neighborhood Market. 
The pharmacy offers a full range of products and services and pharmacy team members are ready to assist customers with product and prescription questions. Trenton residents can easily transfer prescriptions and order refills on the go with the Walmart mobile app for iPhone and Android. New Store, New Jobs for Trenton The new store employs approximately 30 full- and part-time associates. Store manager Andy Zeyen began his Walmart career in 1992 as a deli manager. 
Giving Back to Trenton The grand-opening celebration includes presentations of grants from Walmart and the Walmart Foundation to local community groups. 
In addition to the grants given as part of the grand opening, the new store will further Walmart's pledge to fight hunger in America. As part of Walmart's and the Walmart Foundation's $2 billion commitment to fight hunger through 2015, Walmart stores in Florida donated approximately 35.2 million pounds of food, in fiscal year 2014, or the equivalent of 29.3 million meals. Additionally, Walmart and the Walmart Foundation gave more than $66.8 million in fiscal year 2014 in Florida alone. For more information on Walmart's fight against hunger, visit http://foundation.walmart.com/our-focus/hunger . 
A Big Family Welcome Walmart is happy to be part of the Trenton community and is ready to celebrate with residents on Saturday, July 4. A Big Family Welcome will give customers a chance to meet Zeyen and enjoy fun family activities such as face painting, cupcake decorating and free food samples while supplies last. Join the celebration from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. 
About Walmart Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. (NYSE: WMT) helps people around the world save money and live better - anytime and anywhere -- in retail stores, online, and through their mobile devices. Each week, more than 250 million customers and members visit our 11,202 stores under 71 banners in 27 countries and e-commerce websites in 11 countries. With fiscal year 2014 sales of over $473 billion, Walmart employs more than 2 million associates worldwide. Walmart continues to be a leader in sustainability, corporate philanthropy and employment opportunity. Additional information about Walmart can be found by visiting http://corporate.walmart.com on Facebook at http://facebook.com/walmart and on Twitter at http://twitter.com/walmart . Online merchandise sales are available at http://www.walmart.com and http://www.samsclub.com .
